ValidationRule.description: Makes sure Service Option is populated by close.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") && (ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c , "401(k)" ) || ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c , "Add-On Product" ) ) && ISPICKVAL( Service_Option__c , "") && CloseDate > DATE(2017,1,9)
